mapper.select: SELECT posting.id , posting.deleted , posting.created_at as createdAt , posting.modified_at as modifiedAt , posting.title , posting.content FROM posting WHERE posting.id = #{id}
SELECT posting.id FROM posting WHERE posting.id is not null AND posting.deleted = #{deleted} AND posting.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{title}, '%')
